head.supplied: Repairs to Footpath in Yarra Park. ¶ VICTORIA ¶ SALARIES. ¶ L 1.—[Clause 20 of Regulations.] ¶ The ¶ Corporation of Melbourne ¶ Corporation of Melbourne above GOVERNMENT OF VICTORIA deleted. ¶ ¶ Dr...

div.p: No. 1361, unit 732, VPRS 3181/P Town Clerk's file series 1, VA 511 Melbourne, Public Record Office, Victoria.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p:
MS enclosed in W. Smith to E. FitzGibbon, 15 January 1866: 'I have the honor by command of Dr Mueller to forward to you the acct of the £10"0"0 with which that gentleman was entrusted by yourself for the repair to footpath in Yarra Park, and likewise to express Dr Muellers regret that through the document being mislaid it has not been sooner forwarded.'
See also M to E. FitzGibbon, 27 July 1865. Repairs to Footpath in Yarra Park.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p:
The
Corporation of Melbourne
Corporation of Melbourne above GOVERNMENT OF VICTORIA deleted.
Dr. to the undermentioned persons for Salaries and Wages, from the
1st
day of
September
to the
30th
day of
Septr
186
5,
inclusive .

cell.p: We, the undersigned, do hereby acknowledge to have received from Dr Ferd. Mueller. the sums opposite to our several Names, being in full of our Salaries and Wages for the periods herein specified.

p.seg: I certify that the individuals named in the foregoing Account were actually employed in the Situation and during the period specified opposite the name of each respectively.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: Ferd. Mueller, M.D., Signature of Head of Department—

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; text-align: end;
